result.eng: How many rooms are there in the house? - Three.
result.ga: cé mhéad seomra atá sa teach - trí cinn
result.orig: cé mhéad seomra atá sa teach - trí cinn
result.html: cé mhéad seomra atá sa teach - trí cinnHow many rooms are there in the house? - Three.
result.ponchtml: cé ṁéad seomra atá sa teaċ - trí cinnHow many rooms are there in the house? - Three.

result.eng: It's an old terraced house and there are only three rooms.
result.ga: seanteach sraithe atá ann agus níl ach trí sheomra ann

result.ponchtml: seanteaċ sraiṫe atá ann agus níl aċ trí ẛeomra annIt's an old terraced house and there are only three rooms.

result.eng: I still have the room's keyring.
result.ga: tá fáinne eochrach an tseomra fós agam
